sections.heading: Recovery for damage to unfenced lands; exception3-1427
sections.text: Recovery for damage to unfenced lands; exceptionAn owner or occupant of land is not entitled to recover for damage resulting from the trespass of animals unless the land is enclosed within a lawful fence, but this section shall not apply to owne
